title: S12 Ep35: The Great Pyramid Hoax: Conspiracy to Conceal the True History of Ancient Egypt
itunes:title: The Great Pyramid Hoax: Conspiracy to Conceal the True History of Ancient Egypt
description:
Beyond The Darkness welcomes in Scott Creighton to discuss the inconsistencies of history in regards to much of what we know or THINK we know about Ancient Egypt & The Pyramids.

Scott Creighton: https://www.innertraditions.com/the-great-pyramid-hoax.html
